detectors.description:
SpectreToken._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SpectreToken.sol#1126-1151) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SpectreToken.sol#1138-1139)
detectors.markdown:
[SpectreToken._writeCheckpoint(address,uint32,uint256,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SpectreToken.sol#L1126-L1151) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- [nCheckpoints > 0 && checkpoints[delegatee][nCheckpoints - 1].fromBlock == blockNumber](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SpectreToken.sol#L1138-L1139)

SpectreToken.delegateBySig(address,uint256,uint256,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SpectreToken.sol#991-1027) uses timestamp for comparisons
